ApproxsimClient.map
Class MapDrawer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ApproxsimClient.map.BasicMapDrawer
                      ApproxsimClient.map.MapDrawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
DragGestureListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, EventListener, Accessible, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener, MapDrawableAdapterListener, ApproxsimEventListener
public class MapDrawer
extends BasicMapDrawer
implements DragGestureListener, ApproxsimEventListener

All currently visible elements in the main map are drawed in this class. Thus all shapes, cells, elements, graticules etc. currently displayed are handled here.
The map is rendered by using OpenGL binding for Java (JOGL). GLCanvas is used as a drawing area.

Drag'n'drop is supported in this class. All ApproxsimObject elements with location can be dropped on the map. Further on, elements of type "MilitaryUnits" and "AgencyTeams" can be both dragged and dropped on the map.

See Also:
Serialized Form

mapDrawableAdaptersUnderCursor

public Vector mapDrawableAdaptersUnderCursor()
Returns a vector with all MapDrawableAdapters presently _drawn_ under the cursor. NB the objects has to be rendered to be returned by this function.

Returns:
MapDrawables currently under the cursor on the map.

mapDrawableAdaptersUnderCursor

public Vector mapDrawableAdaptersUnderCursor(Class specifiedClass)
Returns a vector with the MapElementAdapters of the type specified by the input argument presently drawn under the cursor.

Parameters:
specifiedClass - the class of the output elements.
Returns:
the list of elements.
